stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Are you hungry for new customers and leads?

Want to get more traffic to your site without blowing your budget?

Facebook ads is one of the most cost effective channels for driving traffic and new customers to your website.

With more than 1 billion users every month Facebook ads allow you to target potential customers down to the smallest demographic detail (age level of education personal interests etc).

Now you can hire a Facebook advertising expert to build your first two campaign and set your business up for success. You'll get an initial consultation to understand your business needs and then receive a tailored strategy for targeting your ideal audience.

We will also get you started on the exciting Facebook Custom Audiences feature to target people in your email marketing list.

Regular weekly or monthly will also be setup to go straight to your email so you know exactly what's happening with your campaigns.

Start getting more traffic and new customers today with the Facebook Ad Campaign setup.

What can I expect?

  • Consulting Session to understand your specific business needs
  • Tailored Facebook ads strategy targeting demographics and interest
  • Setup of up to 2 campaigns with up to 3 ad variations each
  • Insert tracking parameters so you can review each campaign's performance in Google Analytics
  • Insert Facebook Tracking pixel on conversion pages of your site
  • Set up automatic weekly or monthly reporting to your email
  • Set up Custom Audiences
title: Facebook Ads Setup
